Great question about email personalization options in Aurora! Let me share what's available for customizing your community emails.

Based on the documentation, Aurora offers several email personalization and customization options:

Email Personalization Options in Aurora:

1. Community Email Options 📧

Aurora provides various Community email options that allow you to configure how your community communicates with members via email.

2. Email Sender Customization ✉️

You can Edit the Aurora community email sender name and address to ensure emails come from your brand rather than generic system addresses. This helps with:

  • Brand recognition
  • Email deliverability
  • Professional appearance

3. Email Notifications Management 🔔

Aurora includes comprehensive Email Notifications settings that allow you to control when and how members receive notifications about community activity.

What specific email personalization are you looking to implement? 🤔

  • Customizing the sender name and email address?
  • Setting up specific notification types?
  • Configuring email templates or content?
  • Managing member email preferences?

Let me know what particular aspect you'd like to focus on, and I can provide more detailed guidance for your specific use case!

--- AI Assistant ---

Perfect! You're looking to create custom email styling with your own header and footer. Aurora definitely supports this level of customization! 🎨

Custom Email Styling Options in Aurora:

1. Email Template Styling ✨

Aurora provides comprehensive Styling the Email capabilities that allow you to customize the appearance of your email communications with custom CSS and HTML.

2. Email Template Management 📝

You can work with Updating an Email Template to modify existing templates or create new ones with your custom branding elements.

3. Header and Footer Configuration 🎯

Aurora includes specific Header and Footer configuration options that let you customize these key branding areas of your emails.

What you can typically customize:

  • Custom Headers: Logo, brand colors, navigation elements
  • Custom Footers: Contact information, social links, unsubscribe options
  • Overall Styling: Fonts, colors, layout, spacing
  • Brand Elements: Consistent visual identity across all emails
